name: SeedBot
description:
My entry for the Winter Flowjam 2022

SeedBot has to transform the wasteland into green gardens.   
50 areas need to be taken care off.

Controls:
[Cursor Keys] or onscreen controls to direct him.
[Space] to Restart

Be aware, once he is moving in one direction he can't stop.
Also, he can't step back onto the grass (he is just too heavy ...)

**Credits**
Music by Baconcat 008
Robot Sprite by PolyB
